description:
If your bike is nice enough to have disc brakes, you definitely don’t want to just lay it on the ground. With this adjustable kickstand there is no need to look for a bike rack, or the ideal spot to lean your bike, your bike will always be upright and ready to roll.

  • Chainstay clamp works with bikes equipped with disc brakes
  • Grippy foot prevent slipping
  • Durable cast aluminum and steel construction
  • Adjustable length fits a variety of frame sizes and most 24-28in. wheel bikes
name: 49N Alloy Stay-Mount Disc Kickstand
